languages.text: "В отличие от тебя, Муаран, мне удалось отыскать истину. И правда о гибели Крудараха раскрылась мне... Пусть для этого и пришлось броситься в смертельные объятия Темного города". {n}Ирлиэт хмурится и с вызовом заглядывает в глаза провидца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "В отличие от тебя, Муаран, мне удалось взрастить из семян горести бутон истины. И правда о гибели Крудараха раскрылась мне... Пусть для этого и пришлось броситься в смертельные объятия Темного Города". {n}Ирлиэт хмурится и с вызовом заглядывает в глаза провидца.{/n}

languages.text: "Unlike you, Muaran, I was able to find the truth. The truth of Crudarach's doom was revealed to me... even though that required me to throw myself in the Dark City's deadly embrace." {n}Yrliet frowns and looks defiantly into the Farseer's eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В отличие от тебя, Муаран, мне удалось отыскать истину. И правда о гибели Крудараха раскрылась мне... Пусть для этого и пришлось броситься в смертельные объятия Темного города". {n}Ирлиэт хмурится и с вызовом заглядывает в глаза провидца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Unlike you, Muaran, I was able to grow a flowerbud of truth from the seeds of sorrow. And the truth of Crudarach's doom was revealed to me... Even though that required me to throw myself in the Dark City's deadly embrace." {n}Yrliet frowns and looks defiantly into the Farseer's eyes.{/n}

"Unlike you, Muaran, I was able to grow a flowerbud of truth from the seeds of sorrow. And the truth of Crudarach's doom was revealed to me... Even though that required me to throw myself in the Dark City's deadly embrace." {n}Yrliet frowns and looks defiantly into the Farseer's eyes.{/n}

"Unlike you, Muaran, I was able to find the truth. The truth of Crudarach's doom was revealed to me... even though that required me to throw myself in the Dark City's deadly embrace." {n}Yrliet frowns and looks defiantly into the Farseer's eyes.{/n}

"Unlike you, Muaran, I was able to find the truth. The truth of Crudarach's doom was revealed to me... even though that required me to throw myself in the Dark City's deadly embrace." {n}Yrliet frowns and looks defiantly into the Farseer's eyes.{/n}

languages.text: “我和你不一样，穆兰，我找到了真相。我终于找到了克鲁达拉赫殒灭的真相……哪怕这意味着，我需要投入黑暗之城的致命怀抱。”{n}伊莉耶特皱起了眉头，挑衅般地直视着先知的双眼。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unlike you, Muaran, I was able to find the truth. The truth of Crudarach's doom was revealed to me... even though that required me to throw myself in the Dark City's deadly embrace." {n}Yrliet frowns and looks defiantly into the Farseer's eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我和你不一样，穆兰。对我而言，哪怕是悲伤的种子也能长出真理的花蕾。我终于找到了克鲁达拉赫殒灭的真相……哪怕这意味着，我需要投入黑暗之城的致命怀抱。”{n}伊莉耶特皱起了眉头，挑衅般地直视着先知的双眼。{/n}

languages.text: "Im Gegensatz zu Euch, Muaran, konnte ich die Wahrheit finden. Mir wurde die Wahrheit über Crudarachs Untergang offenbart ... auch wenn ich mich dafür in die tödliche Umarmung der Dunklen Stadt werfen musste." {n}Yrliet runzelt die Stirn und blickt dem Runenpropheten trotzig in die Augen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unlike you, Muaran, I was able to find the truth. The truth of Crudarach's doom was revealed to me... even though that required me to throw myself in the Dark City's deadly embrace." {n}Yrliet frowns and looks defiantly into the Farseer's eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Im Gegensatz zu Euch, Muaran, konnte ich aus der Saat der Trauer eine Blume der Wahrheit erwachsen lassen. Und mir wurde die Wahrheit über Crudarachs Untergang offenbart ... auch wenn ich mich dafür in die tödliche Umarmung der Dunklen Stadt werfen musste." {n}Yrliet runzelt die Stirn und blickt dem Runenpropheten trotzig in die Augen.{/n}

languages.text: «A diferencia de ti, Muaran, yo logré descubrir la verdad sobre la calamidad de Crudarach me fue revelada... aunque para ello tuve que arrojarme al mortal seno de la Ciudad Siniestra». {n}Yrliet frunce el ceño y desafía al vidente con la mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unlike you, Muaran, I was able to find the truth. The truth of Crudarach's doom was revealed to me... even though that required me to throw myself in the Dark City's deadly embrace." {n}Yrliet frowns and looks defiantly into the Farseer's eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «A diferencia de ti, Muaran, yo logré cultivar un brote de verdad a partir de las semillas de la tristeza. Y la verdad sobre la calamidad de Crudarach me fue revelada... aunque para ello tuve que arrojarme al mortal seno de la Ciudad Siniestra». {n}Yrliet frunce el ceño y desafía al vidente con la mirada.{/n}

languages.text: « Contrairement à vous, Muaran, j'ai trouvé la vérité. Le véritable sort de Crudarach m'a été révélé... même s'il m'a fallu pour cela m'offrir à la terrible étreinte de la Cité Crépusculaire. » {n}Les sourcils froncés, Yrliet jette un regard de défi au Grand Prophète.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unlike you, Muaran, I was able to find the truth. The truth of Crudarach's doom was revealed to me... even though that required me to throw myself in the Dark City's deadly embrace." {n}Yrliet frowns and looks defiantly into the Farseer's eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Contrairement à vous, Muaran, j'ai trouvé la vérité en sondant notre océan de tristesse. Le véritable sort de Crudarach m'a été révélé... même s'il m'a fallu pour cela m'offrir à la terrible étreinte de la Cité Crépusculaire. » {n}Les sourcils froncés, Yrliet jette un regard de défi au Grand Prophète.{/n}

languages.text: 「ムアラン、あなたと違って私は真実を知れた。そう、クルダラの破滅の真実を…そのためには、仄暗き都の抱擁の中に命を賭して身を投じる必要があったけれど」{n}ユリエットは顔をしかめ、反抗的に先見司の目を見つめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unlike you, Muaran, I was able to find the truth. The truth of Crudarach's doom was revealed to me... even though that required me to throw myself in the Dark City's deadly embrace." {n}Yrliet frowns and looks defiantly into the Farseer's eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ムアラン、あなたと違って私は真実を知れた。そう、クルダラの破滅の真実を…そのためには、仄暗き都の抱擁の中に命を賭して身を投じる必要があったけれど」{n}ユリエットは顔をしかめ、反抗的に先見司の目を見つめる。{/n}

languages.text: "Muaran, senin aksine hakikati buldum ben. Crudarach'ın akıbetiyle ilgili gerçeği gördüm... Kendimi Kara Şehir'in ölümcül pençelerine atmam gerekti ama olsun." {n}Yrliet, kaşlarını çatıp isyan edercesine Ötesezen'in gözlerine bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unlike you, Muaran, I was able to find the truth. The truth of Crudarach's doom was revealed to me... even though that required me to throw myself in the Dark City's deadly embrace." {n}Yrliet frowns and looks defiantly into the Farseer's eyes.{/n}
